distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xerces-c fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-12627: Processing of external DTD paths could have resulted in a
  null pointer dereference under certain conditions (bsc#1083630)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Apache Xerces-C XML Parser library before 3.2.1, processing of external DTD paths can result in a null pointer dereference under certain conditions.
notes.title: CVE description
